summary: George, a lonely and fatalistic teen who has made it all the way to his senior year without ever having done a real day of work, is befriended by Sally, a popular but complicated girl who recognizes in him a kindred spirit.
cast: Freddie Highmore|Emma Roberts|Sasha Spielberg|Marcus Carl Franklin|Ann Dowd|Maya Ri Sanchez|Blair Underwood|Ann Harada|Rita Wilson|Jarlath Conroy|Elizabeth Reaser|Andrew Levitas|Sam Robards|Alicia Silverstone|Michael Angarano|Dan Leonard|Sophie Lane Curtis|Joseph Ernest|Megan Grieco|Lindsay-Elizabeth Hand|Shelby Kovant|Scott O'Grady|Zoe Portanova|Sarah Seeds
title: El arte de pasar de todo
